-ane mama nam deshapalanaya wage jarawak gana katha karan naha- kiyamin pirisiduwadi wrathayak penwana sinhala bauddha ahinsakaya bas ekathula nadunana gahaniyakata jak ekak gahana kota eeketh deshapalanayak thiyenawa.asanwara yayi sammatha widihata muhunu pothe pinthuru dagena inna tharuniyange ee pinthura rasawidina gaman -eeya me wage gahanu- kiyana nuthana yugaye dharmapalalage prakashayak gaththama eekath deshapalanikayi.gahanu pirimi sabadathawayak wage saralama thanakath,samaja panthin athara sabadathawayan wani sankirnama thanakath yana me hama thanekama deshapalanaya thiyenawa.rajya balaya pilibada karanayedi deshapalanaya uparima widihata prakashanaya wena athara ape pudgalika jiwitha wala edineda siduwim walinuth deshapalanaya eliyata paninawa.

ape pahan kuduwa pandata danuna hati dan onna ape ewun dakkoth kiyayi thama mu ooka allagena kiyawanawa da kiyala.ow kiyawanawa thamayi moko athe karagata thama bahala na.kakule thuwala thama sanipa na.kuduwe lassana dakala hithe athi wuna thanthose thama ithirenawa.katha karana ahana dakina aya kuduwa lassanayi hoda wadak kale kiyanawa kuduwa hadanna salli madi wunama naya wuna naya karayo gana ra thisse mathak wenawa ithin mama hamadema katha karana mage blog eketh eka gana liyana eka waradi na neda aayibon.

arabi lokaya thula mahinda rajapaksha namayata wishala gaurawayak wagema wishala bhakthiyak thibenawa.me hama deyak ganama samabarawa kalpana kalama warthamana deshapalana lokaya thula muslimwarunata samipama deshapalagnyaya thamayi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha.*

athithaye thibu nam ha yatath wijitha samaye damu nam aadiya gana unwahanse witin wita prakasha kalaha.
honda satan kamiyeku kisi witaka eka iriyawwen nositi.

angoda lokkata wada bhayanaka hathura harsha yayi sitha samayan harshawa ghathanaya kalath ohu pitupasa thibena dawantha hasthaya gana samayan kalpana kara thibune natha.

kolambaa - monaragala bas warjanayak dakunu adhiwegayata adata wasara 3yi - marana 16yi paradduwath parani kramaya yatathe eekath sammathayi janapathi putuwata wamenuth apekshakayek danawa wasare gatha wu kalaya thula dengu rogin 39,842 k nithi ullanghanaya kaloth balagenayi!
ee ee sthanayanhi ha kalayan dana siyalu subha wada nokara athhala yuthu bawada sandahan weyi.
